definitions: a mythical creature akin to a phoenix that is often described as a large, shimmering bird of flames.
any of several species of birds with vibrant red or orange plumage.
a type of sports car manufactured by Pontiac, known for its speed and performance.
examples: The firebird in the legend rose from the ashes.
The photographer captured a stunning image of the firebird perched under the sun.
He drove his vintage firebird to the car show.
